name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. James Joseph FRITZ, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Fritz

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. James Joseph FRITZ, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 18th day of August, 1997, there having been filed with this Court by James Joseph Fritz his verified Statement of Resignation dated July 14, 1997, stating that he desires to resign from the Bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania in accordance with the provisions of Rule 215, Pa.R.D.E., it is
ORDERED that the resignation of James Joseph Fritz be and it is hereby accepted and he is DISBARRED ON CONSENT from the Bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania; and it is further ORDERED that he shall comply with the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E. Respondent shall pay costs, if any, to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
699 A.2d 718
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. James Joseph FRITZ, Respondent.
No. 360 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 18, 1997.
